GapFillInput.Title: Past simple
GapFillInput.Instruction: Put the verb in brackets into the Past simple.

Content.Question:
1. In 1960 the USA put (put) the first weather satellite in space.
2. In 1910 Roald Amundsen from Norway became (become) the first person to reach the South Pole.
3. In 1920 the British writer Agatha Christie wrote (write) her first detective novel.
4. In 1930 a New York businessman, Clarence Birdseye made (make) the first frozen vegetables.
5. In 1940 American soldiers drove (drive) the first jeeps.
6. In 1950 people used (use) the first ‘Diner's Club' credit card to pay for dinner or drinks.
7. In 1900 the USA won (win) the first Davis Cup tennis competition.
8. In 1970 Pan Am started (start) the first Boeing 747 ‘jumbo jet' service.
9. In 1980 Sony invented (invent) the first ‘Walkman' personal cassette player.
10. In 1990 Nelson Mandela walked (walk) as a free man for the first time after 27 years in a South African prison.
